attributes.name: Enmity
attributes.description: "We look upon each other as enemies, but it goes deeper than that. It is a deep, seething darkness that knows no measure."
attributes.parsed_description: "We look upon each other as enemies, but it goes deeper than that. It is a deep, seething darkness that knows no measure."

attributes.name: Envy of Belam
attributes.description: "Many a hunter tried to take down Odious Belam, but only one came close, armed with this spear."
attributes.parsed_description: "Many a hunter tried to take down Odious Belam, but only one came close, armed with this spear."

attributes.name: Eruption
attributes.description: "My rage boils within me. Do not tempt me to let it loose."
attributes.parsed_description: "My rage boils within me. Do not tempt me to let it loose."

attributes.name: Essence of Clarity
attributes.description: "Find the part of you that knows what good is. Nurture it and it will grow."
attributes.parsed_description: "Find the part of you that knows what good is. Nurture it and it will grow."

attributes.name: Essence of Hope
attributes.description: "So long as my staff lights the way our hope shall remain."
attributes.parsed_description: "So long as my staff lights the way our hope shall remain."

attributes.name: Eternal Dusk
attributes.description: "It is only in these moments that I feel our twilight lasts forever."
attributes.parsed_description: "It is only in these moments that I feel our twilight lasts forever."

attributes.name: Eternal Rest
attributes.description: "Sleep now, your work here is done."
attributes.parsed_description: "Sleep now, your work here is done."

attributes.name: Eternal Servitude
attributes.description: "With this blade, we grant you the power and life to rise again forever more."
attributes.parsed_description: "With this blade, we grant you the power and life to rise again forever more."

attributes.name: Eternal Suffering
attributes.description: "Even death fails to bring solace."
attributes.parsed_description: "Even death fails to bring solace."

attributes.name: Ethereal Conduit
attributes.description: "Ghosts seem drawn to the weapon.""
attributes.parsed_description: "Ghosts seem drawn to the weapon.""

attributes.name: Eunuch's Savior
attributes.description: "This is a tough world for a eunuch. One must carry a weapon to defend oneself."
attributes.parsed_description: "This is a tough world for a eunuch. One must carry a weapon to defend oneself."

attributes.name: Everfall Crusher
attributes.description: A War Hammer, given as a gift for helping the townspeople of Everfall.
attributes.parsed_description: A War Hammer, given as a gift for helping the townspeople of Everfall.

attributes.name: Ever Giving
attributes.description: "As snow falls from the sky, the gift of winter calm spreads to all caught outside."
attributes.parsed_description: "As snow falls from the sky, the gift of winter calm spreads to all caught outside."

attributes.name: Everlasting Shade
attributes.description: "Fear not, my guard is as wide as the boughs of the mighty oak."
attributes.parsed_description: "Fear not, my guard is as wide as the boughs of the mighty oak."

attributes.name: Eviscerator
attributes.description: "It's famously difficult to bisect a person. Unless of course you have this."
attributes.parsed_description: "It's famously difficult to bisect a person. Unless of course you have this."

attributes.name: Excavation Hatchet
attributes.description: A reward from William Heron for recovering the Foreman's Ledger.
attributes.parsed_description: A reward from William Heron for recovering the Foreman's Ledger.

attributes.name: Executioner
attributes.description: "Bow to the executioner, pay your penance."
attributes.parsed_description: "Bow to the executioner, pay your penance."

attributes.name: Executioner's Burden
attributes.description: "Know that I take no joy in ending your life."
attributes.parsed_description: "Know that I take no joy in ending your life."

attributes.name: Explosive Fire Staff
attributes.description: "The perfect weapon for giving yourself an explosive edge in battle."
attributes.parsed_description: "The perfect weapon for giving yourself an explosive edge in battle."

attributes.name: Eye Of Darkness
attributes.description: "Look too long into this blade, and you'll learn things about yourself you never wanted to know."
attributes.parsed_description: "Look too long into this blade, and you'll learn things about yourself you never wanted to know."

attributes.name: Eye of the Inferno
attributes.description: "The eye plucked from a great lion makes an excellent focus for fire."
attributes.parsed_description: "The eye plucked from a great lion makes an excellent focus for fire."

attributes.name: Eye of the Storm
attributes.description: "They say the eye of the storm is where it is calmest. They haven't met my blade."
attributes.parsed_description: "They say the eye of the storm is where it is calmest. They haven't met my blade."

attributes.name: Faedragon's Claw
attributes.description: "If dragons ever did exist in their land, then surely this weapon is forged from one of their claws. The sheer size of such a claw speaks to the possibility."
attributes.parsed_description: "If dragons ever did exist in their land, then surely this weapon is forged from one of their claws. The sheer size of such a claw speaks to the possibility."

attributes.name: Faedragon's Life Staff
attributes.description: "The feather of a faedragon is attached to the base of this staff. Ancient legends say that their feathers bring blessings to those who posses them."
attributes.parsed_description: "The feather of a faedragon is attached to the base of this staff. Ancient legends say that their feathers bring blessings to those who posses them."

attributes.name: Faefolk's Spear
attributes.description: "Beautiful flowers and vines adorn every corner of this weapon. It is as enchanting as it is deadly."
attributes.parsed_description: "Beautiful flowers and vines adorn every corner of this weapon. It is as enchanting as it is deadly."

attributes.name: Faeforged Musket
attributes.description: "The faefolk never used rifles, so its particularly peculiar that they would possess one."
attributes.parsed_description: "The faefolk never used rifles, so its particularly peculiar that they would possess one."

attributes.name: Faeforged Rapier
attributes.description: "Lightweight with immeasurable strength."
attributes.parsed_description: "Lightweight with immeasurable strength."

attributes.name: Faemother's Great Axe
attributes.description: "She sought to defend her people but found only death."
attributes.parsed_description: "She sought to defend her people but found only death."

attributes.name: Fae Ranger's Longbow
attributes.description: "While the faefolk haven't been seen for centuries, legends still circulate about their cunning rangers and their prowess with a bow."
attributes.parsed_description: "While the faefolk haven't been seen for centuries, legends still circulate about their cunning rangers and their prowess with a bow."

attributes.name: Faith Finder
attributes.description: "It is said being wounded from this is crossbow is a sure way to discover your faith."
attributes.parsed_description: "It is said being wounded from this is crossbow is a sure way to discover your faith."

attributes.name: Fallen Comrade
attributes.description: "You may have his face, but you are not my brother."
attributes.parsed_description: "You may have his face, but you are not my brother."

attributes.name: Fallen Friend
attributes.description: "I lost most of my crew when I came to Aeternum. But the loss that hurt the most was that of my dear dog. While she came back like all things do here, she was... different."
attributes.parsed_description: "I lost most of my crew when I came to Aeternum. But the loss that hurt the most was that of my dear dog. While she came back like all things do here, she was... different."

attributes.name: Fallen Star
attributes.description: "Forged from the remains of a star that fell into the earth, leaving some foreign glowing metal behind."
attributes.parsed_description: "Forged from the remains of a star that fell into the earth, leaving some foreign glowing metal behind."

attributes.name: Falmea’s Wrath
attributes.description: "The raging light before the darkness"
attributes.parsed_description: "The raging light before the darkness"

attributes.name: False Hope
attributes.description: "Even in the darkest deception, lies some small truth."
attributes.parsed_description: "Even in the darkest deception, lies some small truth."

attributes.name: Famed Trueshot
attributes.description: "She was known across aeternum for her accuracy. She never missed a shot."
attributes.parsed_description: "She was known across aeternum for her accuracy. She never missed a shot."

attributes.name: Fanatic's Fire Staff
attributes.name_with_affixes: Fanatic's Fire Staff of the Scholar
attributes.description: "His eagerness to spread the message of his faith was equal only to his willingness to denouce those who did not share it."
attributes.parsed_description: "His eagerness to spread the message of his faith was equal only to his willingness to denouce those who did not share it."

attributes.name: Fanatic's Flatbow
attributes.description: "His eagerness to spread the message of his faith was equal only to his willingness to denouce those who did not share it."

attributes.name: Fanatic's Great Axe
